articles.title: Harvard Sues Trump Administration For Barring Enrolment Of Foreign Students
articles.description: Harvard University on Friday sued the US administration against its decision to revoke its eligibility to enrol international students, in an escalation of the fight between President Donald Trump and the prestigious university.
